hero.title: Fresh, Flavorful Tacos & More
hero.subtitle: Reno’s beloved taco spot — delicious tacos, bold sauces, and friendly service.

important.announcement: Family-run taco shop tucked away behind Death & Taxes in downtown Reno.
important.highlight: Authentic street-style tacos and more — well worth the find!

about.heading: Local Favorite With Big Flavor
paragraphs: At Taco Shop, customers come back again and again for tacos that are consistently fresh, full of flavor, and authentically prepared. Whether it’s classic carne asada, crispy fish, or creative options like cheeseburger and veggie tacos, every bite delivers bold taste.

Locals and visitors alike love our welcoming service, delicious house-made sauces, and casual outdoor seating. With reasonable prices and quality you’ll notice in every bite, Taco Shop turns first-timers into regulars.

sections.title: TACOS
sections.description: Soft corn tortillas, choice of salsa: roja, verde or pico
sections.pricing: No mix & match · 2 for $7 or 3 for $10
